title: Angel & Faith: Season Nine #1
description: Left in a near-catatonic state following the events in Buffy Season 8, Angel will need a seriously rude awakening if he's to make amends for his ill- conceived deeds. Enter a rebel Slayer with a causeFaith Lehane. Together they'll have full access to the Watcher files and opportunities to make amends for all they've doneÂ¦and will do. Christos Gage (Avengers Academy) and Rebekah Isaacs (DV8)! Executive produced by Joss Whedon!
author: Christos Gage
